title: Playwright Test Component
html:
Captured via Playwright

This component was captured using Playwright automation and should appear in the IDE!
css: .test-hero { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff6b6b, #4ecdc4); padding: 40px; color: white; border-radius: 15px; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .test-hero h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .test-hero p { font-size: 1.2rem; opacity: 0.95; }
